sentence.english: This heat is due to high atmospheric pressure.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikiatsu

sentence.kanji: 低気圧が近づいています。
sentence.romaji: teikiatsu ga chikazuite imasu
sentence.english: A low-pressure front is approaching.

cards.english: husband and wife, Mr. and Mrs.
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusai

sentence.kanji: 昨日の夜、社長ご夫妻と食事をしました。
sentence.romaji: kinou no yoru shachougofusai to shokuji wo shimashita
sentence.english: I had dinner with the president and his wife last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shounin

sentence.kanji: これは政府の承認を受けた資格です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha seifu no shounin wo uketa shikaku desu
sentence.english: This is a qualification approved by the government

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouchi

sentence.kanji: そのことは承知しております。
sentence.romaji: sono koto ha shouchi shite orimasu
sentence.english: I know that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinodoku

sentence.kanji: 彼らは気の毒な生活をしている。
sentence.romaji: karera ha kinodoku na seikatsu wo shite iru
sentence.english: They live pitiful lives.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jimen

sentence.kanji: 地面に何か絵が描いてあるぞ。
sentence.romaji: jimen ni nanika e ga kaite aru zo
sentence.english: There is a picture drawn on the ground.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honrai

sentence.kanji: 彼女はプレッシャーから解放されて本来の自分に戻ったな。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha puresha- kara kaihou sarete honrai no jibun ni modota na
sentence.english: She was relieved of the pressure and became herself again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oogoe

sentence.kanji: 私たちは大声で歌を歌ったの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha oogoe de uta wo utata no
sentence.english: We sang loudly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's waraigoe

sentence.kanji: 部屋の中から笑い声が聞こえた。
sentence.romaji: heya no naka kara waraigoe ga kikoeta
sentence.english: I heard laughter coming from the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakigoe

sentence.kanji: 赤ちゃんの泣き声が聞こえますね。
sentence.romaji: akachan no nakigoe ga kikoemasu ne
sentence.english: I can hear a baby crying.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashigoe

sentence.kanji: 隣の部屋から話し声が聞こえます。
sentence.romaji: tonari no heya kara hanashigoe ga kikoemasu
sentence.english: I can hear voices coming from the room next door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mendou

sentence.kanji: 会社で面倒なことが起こったの。
sentence.romaji: kaisha de mendou na koto ga okota no
sentence.english: There was some trouble at the office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kizetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は驚いて気絶してしまったの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha odoroite kizetsu shite shimata no
sentence.english: She fainted in surprise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuge

sentence.kanji: やかんから湯気が出ていますよ。
sentence.romaji: yakan kara yuge ga dete imasu yo
sentence.english: Steam is coming out the kettle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mendoukusai

sentence.kanji: この計算は面倒臭いなあ。
sentence.romaji: kono keisan ha mendoukusai naa
sentence.english: This calculation is troublesome.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honki

sentence.kanji: いや、僕は本気なんだ。
sentence.romaji: iya boku ha honki na n da
sentence.english: No, I'm serious.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's otoroeru

sentence.kanji: 年と共に体力が衰えています。
sentence.romaji: toshi to tomo ni tairyoku ga otoroete imasu
sentence.english: The body has become weak with age.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushiatsui

sentence.kanji: 今日は蒸し暑いね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha mushiatsui ne
sentence.english: It's humid today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitai

sentence.kanji: 水が沸騰して気体になったんだ。
sentence.romaji: mizu ga futou shite kitai ni nata n da
sentence.english: The water boiled and then turned into gas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zashiki

sentence.kanji: 明日はお座敷での宴会になります。
sentence.romaji: ashita ha ozashiki de no enkai ni narimasu
sentence.english: Tomorrow's banquet will be in a tatami-floored room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikikin

sentence.kanji: マンションの敷金を払いました。
sentence.romaji: manshon no shikikin wo haraimashita
sentence.english: I paid the deposit on the apartment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuuki

sentence.kanji: 彼は勇気があるね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yuuki ga aru ne
sentence.english: He's courageous.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tobioriru

sentence.kanji: 猫が屋根から飛び下りました。
sentence.romaji: neko ga yane kara tobiorimashita
sentence.english: A cat jumped down from the roof.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's houmen

sentence.kanji: 沖縄方面にお出かけの方は台風にご注意ください。
sentence.romaji: okinawa houmen ni odekake no kata ha taifuu ni gochuui kudasai
sentence.english: People going in the direction of Okinawa should be careful of typhoons.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's utagoe

sentence.kanji: 校舎から歌声が聞こえて来たよ。
sentence.romaji: kousha kara utagoe ga kikoete kita yo
sentence.english: You could hear singing coming from the school building.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goraku

sentence.kanji: テレビは彼のいちばんの娯楽です。
sentence.romaji: terebi ha kare no ichiban no goraku desu
sentence.english: Watching TV is his favorite way of passing time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kisha

sentence.kanji: 汽車で街まで行った。
sentence.romaji: kisha de machi made ita
sentence.english: I went to town by train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mayu

sentence.kanji: 彼は眉が濃いね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mayu ga koi ne
sentence.english: He has thick eyebrows.
